textBeforeTable: File-Level (Global) Attributes GLAH12 Product Data Dictionary Web pages Data Sets End Example Notices--> On Friday, 06 February 2015 from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. (USA Mountain Time), we will be performing scheduled maintenance, which may cause temporary disruptions to our Web site, applications, and FTP. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you. On Thursday, 12 June 2014 from 3:00 p.m. to 4:00 p.m. (USA Mountain Time), our Web services will be unavailable due to NSIDC server maintenance. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you. The NSIDC Web site and data services are currently having intermittent problems and may be unavailable. We are working to restore these services as soon as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Please contact NSIDC User Services for assistance. From 4:30 p.m. Wednesday, June 04 until noon Friday, June 06 (USA Mountain Time), our Web site
